events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was reviewed and classified under Refund due to customer's request for money back.
Your case has been assigned to an agent specializing in refund requests. They will assist you shortly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want to return your product and receive a refund.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure. My order number is 123456789. The product does not match the description and I would prefer to get my money back.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid label to return the item.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the prompt assistance and will send the item back today.
We have processed your refund. Please ship the product back with the provided label within 7 days to complete the return.
Just checking in to make sure you were able to return your product and that your refund was satisfactory.
Yes, I returned the product and received the refund. Everything went smoothly, thank you very much!
We are glad we could resolve your issue. Weâ€™re closing this case now. Have a great day!
